statements: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'Low';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_status = 'Open';
SELECT scan_date, assessment_notes FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_status FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'Medium' ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY vulnerability_severity ASC;
SELECT scan_id, vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity, assessment_notes FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_status = 'Open' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, assessment_notes FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity IN ('High', 'Medium') AND vulnerability_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'High' OR vulnerability_status = 'Open' ORDER BY scan_date ASC;
SELECT scan_id, vulnerability_name, vulnerability_status FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'Low' AND assessment_notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scan_results;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_scan_results;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scan_results WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scan_results ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_status FROM vulnerability_assessments;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerability_scan_results WHERE vulnerability_severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scan_results ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scan_results WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT VS.vulnerability_name, VA.assessment_status FROM vulnerability_scan_results AS VS INNER JOIN vulnerability_assessments AS VA ON VS.scan_id = VA.scan_id WHERE VA.assessment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT vulnerability_severity, COUNT(*) FROM vulnerability_scan_results GROUP BY vulnerability_severity;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT scan_name, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, severity, description FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT scan_name, vulnerability_count FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_count > 10;
SELECT assessment_date, vulnerability_status FROM vulnerability_status ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT scan_id, scan_name, scan_date, vulnerability_count FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerability_count >= 10;
SELECT v.scan_name, v.scan_date, a.severity, a.description FROM vulnerability_scans v INNER JOIN vulnerability_assessments a ON v.scan_id = a.scan_id;

SELECT v.scan_name, a.assessment_date, s.vulnerability_status FROM vulnerability_scans v INNER JOIN vulnerability_assessments a ON v.scan_id = a.scan_id INNER JOIN vulnerability_status s ON a.assessment_id = s.assessment_id;
SELECT scan_name, MAX(scan_date) AS latest_scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vulnerabilities FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE severity = 'High' AND assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scan_results ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT assessment_id, vulnerability_id FROM assessments WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT scan_id, scan_date, scan_result FROM vulnerability_scan_results WHERE scan_result LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scan_results ORDER BY scan_date DESC
SELECT v.vulnerability_name, a.status FROM vulnerabilities v JOIN assessments a ON v.vulnerability_id = a.vulnerability_id WHERE a.status = 'open'
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.status FROM users u JOIN assessments a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE status != 'resolved'
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT scan_id, scanner_name FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT assessment_id, scan_id, assessment_date FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, vulnerability_description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM comments WHERE vulnerability_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE num_vulnerabilities > 10 ORDER BY scan_date DESC;

SELECT assessments.assessment_id, assessments.assessment_date, vulnerability_scans.scan_date FROM assessments INNER JOIN vulnerability_scans ON assessments.scan_id = vulnerability_scans.scan_id WHERE assessments.assessment_result = 'High Risk' ORDER BY assessments.assessment_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_scans, AVG(num_vulnerabilities) AS avg_vulnerabilities FROM vulnerability_scans;

SELECT vulnerabilities.vulnerability_name, comments.commenter_name, comments.comment_text FROM vulnerabilities INNER JOIN comments ON vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = comments.vulnerability_id WHERE vulnerabilities.vulnerability_name LIKE '%SQL Injection%';
SELECT assessment_id, reviewer_name, assessment_result FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
